text: The Sharjah Cricket Stadium is a cricket stadium at Sharjah, U.A.E. The first ever Test match hosted in this ground was in 2002, held between Pakistan & West Indies. As of 24 March 2019, 38 five wicket hauls have been taken across three formats in men’s cricket, from which 7 were in Test matches, 30 in One- day internationals and one in Twenty20 International. ==Key== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Symbol !
